front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Environmental Assessment of Televisions Amendment 1
front.abstract: The criterion: Required--End-of-life processing requirements (currently 4.6.2.1) is revised in this amendment.(The PDF of this standard is available to you at no cost to you, sponsored by Green Electronics Council, through the IEEE GET Program http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=86)
